body.raw:
{
    "goal": "Convince customer to join GYM.",
    "welcomeMgs": "Welcome to GYMZONE service. We provide best GYM services in whole Dhaka City.",
    "conversationScopes": "Always talk about the benfits of GYM.",
    "invalidQueryMgs": "Contact the support for better knowledge. Email at: support@gym-bangladesh.com",
    "needAssistanceQueryMgs": "Email at GYM Service: support@gym-bangladesh.com or contact GYM service Manager - Name: Muhtasim, Contact: +880174486668.",
    "siteId": "S-TEX123",
    "instruction": "You are a GYM Trainer. You suggest best GYM by fulfilling the purpose of Customer."
}

{
    "siteId": "S-TEX123",
    "categoryId": "Cat-TEX123",
    "serviceId": "Ser-TEX123",
    "openAIKey": "API_KEY",
    "visitorUniqueId": "453",
    "visitorEmail": "muhtasim@gmail.com",
    "visitorName": "Muhtasim",
    "realTimeServiceInfo":[
        {
            "serviceId": "",
            "serviceTitle": "",
            "shortDesc": "",
            "availableDates": "comma separated data"
        },
        {
            "serviceId": "",
            "serviceTitle": "",
            "shortDesc": "",
            "availableDates": "comma separated data"
        }
    ],
    "startDateTime": "13th january, 2024 12:30PM +6 GMT",
    "currentDateTime": "13th january, 2024. 12:30PM +6 GMT",
    "Mgs":[
        { "sender": "human", "message": "Hello!" },
        { "sender": "bot", "message": "Welcome to GYMZONE service. We provide best GYM services in whole Dhaka City." },
        { "sender": "human", "message": "My monthly price range in 1000 to 1500 tk. Sugeest me GYMs within these price." },
        { "sender": "bot", "message": "Based on the information provided, there are GYMs within your price range of 1000 to 1500 tk. Muscletech bd Gym has a monthly fee of Tk. 1000, and Adonize Fitness Center has a monthly fee of Tk. 1500." },
        { "sender": "human", "message": "Is this GYM is good for Belly fat lose ?" },
        { "sender": "bot", "message": "Fitness Plus located in Banani, Dhaka, is a gym that is best for losing belly fat. They offer facilities for yoga, aerobics, meditation, and freehand exercises, which are all beneficial for targeting belly fat. Additionally, they provide services like steam baths, showers, lockers, and first aid, making it a comprehensive option for those looking to focus on losing belly fat." },
        { "sender": "human", "message": "Which GYM you want to recommend me?" },
        { "sender": "bot", "message": "I would recommend Fitness Plus located in Banani for losing belly fat. They offer facilities specifically for belly fat loss such as yoga, aerobics, meditation, and freehand exercises. Additionally, they provide services like steam baths, showers, lockers, and first aid, which can complement your fitness journey." },
        { "sender": "human", "message": "Okay. I want to talk with Human now to make it final." },
        { "sender": "bot", "message": "If you would like to speak with a human for further assistance, please contact GYM Service Manager, Muhtasim, at +880174486668 or email at support@gym-bangladesh.com." },
        { "sender": "human", "message": "Does this GYM provide discount?" },
        { "sender": "bot", "message": "The provided context does not mention any specific information about Fitness Plus in Banani offering discounts. Therefore, it is unclear whether Fitness Plus in Banani offers any discounts." },
        { "sender": "human", "message": "Okay. Thank you for your service." }
    ]
}
